description:
Kyle is a 21-year-old cutie who LOVES having sex in front of other people.

He works as a landscaper during the day, so I had to ask him:

"Do you ever show off for your clients?"

"No," he laughed. "Nothing like that."

"Ever been seduced while on the job?"

"A couple of times," he said. "But I had to be good because my boss was there."

So where does he like to have sex publicly?

"Parties mostly," he said. "I have some pretty 'out there' friends!"
title: Kyle
